synopsis.text: Slayer Corps, the relentless Tanjirou Kamado, his fierce comrades Zenitsu Agatsuma and Inosuke Hashibira, and the flamboyant Sound Hashira, Tengen Uzui, embark on a perilous mission to the Entertainment District, a place where desires intertwine with darkness. After the harrowing Mugen Train incident, the group seeks respite, but the vicious demons do not rest. A sinister demon has been preying on the district's enchanting women, and Tengen's three wives, who were on the case, have vanished without a trace. To uncover the truth and locate the malevolent Upper Rank Demon, Tanjirou and his friends must infiltrate the district's most prominent houses, disguised as women themselves. As they delve deeper into the heart of the district, they will confront formidable foes and unravel the mysteries of the Breath of Fire. Will Tanjirou and his allies be able to save the district's women and defeat the demonic forces that lurk in the shadows? Join them in this thrilling chapter of "Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Entertainment District Arc."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
